articles.title: Australia Doubles Foreign Student Visa Fee To Tackle Migration - NDTV
articles.description: Australia said on Monday it had more than doubled the visa fee for international students, the latest move by the government to rein in record migration that has intensified pressure on an already tight housing market.

articles.author: TOI World Desk
articles.title: Australia foreign student visa policy changes: Fees doubled, extension gets difficult - The Times of India
articles.description: Rest of World News: NEW DELHI: Australia has significantly increased the visa fee for international students, more than doubling the cost from A$710 to A$1,600.
